root.name: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows
root.description: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows is a fantasy RPG following four heroes: a warrior, a valkyrie, a wizard, and an elf as they battle to right the wrongs of an emperor who has left the fate of the world in peril.Like previous Gauntlet games, you and up to three more friends can battle simultaneously either locally or for the first time in the series, online. The game has improved the combat over previous iterations by giving each character their own set of combo moves, which can be expanded by purchasing new combos at the end of each level.Xbox Originals On July 14, 2008, Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows became available on the Xbox 360's Xbox Originals download service for 1200 Microsoft Points.Â
